definition: Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area, established in 2017, consisting of Hong Kong, Macao and nine cities in Guangdong
pinyin: Yue4 Gang3 Ao4 Da4 wan1 Qu1

definition: Cantonese/short name for Guangdong 廣東|广东[Guang3 dong1]
Hong Kong, abbr. for 香港[Xiang1 gang3]/surname Gang
abbr. for Macao 澳門|澳门/abbr. for Australia 澳大利亞|澳大利亚
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
